title: Lf experienced smurf to duo with
body:
Hi, I really want to reach gold rank by end of this season. i don't want anything past gold 5 but no matter how hard I try I cannot get to that goal. I went all the way to silver 1 100lp to silver 2 75lp. The season is ending soon and if there is anyone who is capable of helping me reach that goal then please help me. I main jungle playing yi and jax but I can also play adc.

My summoner name is apex1997

replies.body: Can you please help me get to gold or something?
